original_text: God saw what the people in Nineveh did. He saw that they stopped doing evil things. He had said that he would punish them for their sins. But now he decided that he would not destroy them.
korean_text: 하나님이 그들이 행한 것 곧 그 악한 길에서 돌이켜 떠난 것을 보시고 하나님이 뜻을 돌이키사 그들에게 내리리라고 말씀하신 재앙을 내리지 아니하시니라

sentences.original_text: God saw what the people in Nineveh did
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 니느웨 사람들이 한 일을 보셨다

sentences.original_text: He saw that they stopped doing evil things
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그들이 악한 행동을 그쳤다는 것을 보셨다

sentences.original_text: He had said that he would punish them for their sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그들의 죄로 그들을 벌하겠다고 말씀하셨다

sentences.original_text: But now he decided that he would not destroy them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이제 그분은 그들을 멸망시키지 않기로 결정하셨다
